title: Unable to Connect
body: > Everything goes smoothly up until after Champion Selection. Once the game goes to load up the preview of the lobby (before the actual game begins), the screen turns white and does not work. Please help me. I have a photo but idk how to attach it onto here

replies.body:
Really quickly about the screenshots, you can attach any photos here by linking the url where they can be found online (you could use Gyazo or Imgur to save them online and generate a link at the same time).

With that info out of the way, it sounds like your client may have lost it's connection to the game server you were going to be playing on. If it loses its connection on the loading screen, the game doesn't really understand what's happened and freezes up sometimes. Let's try adjusting some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure those loading screens go a little smoother.
